about_the_game:
About

Wee Survivors is a 'bullet heaven' inspired arcade shooter with minimalist controls and gameplay. Survive as long as you can, choose from an array of abilities and upgrades, unlock new characters and choose from a selection of permanent upgrades to become even more powerful in each fresh run.

Ready to feel powerful?

Don't stress out about what path to take, every build can work!

Time is in your control

Take your time, strategize, and enjoy the thrill of slow-motion monster destruction. Every move counts in Wee Survivors!

Upgrade

Call down lightning with the Lightning Wand, blast away with the Plasma Rifle and fling stinky muck with the Muck Chucker! There's tons of weapons and powers for you to choose from.

Select your gear

Gear change how you approach each run! Build to maximzie your crit rating, build a stationary glass cannon, or create a speed build that calls down orbital strikes!

Choose your character

Each character has unique a unique starting weapon and ultimate ability. No two characters are the same, unlock the cast and play as your favourites!

Survive

Manage to survive? There's a surprise waiting for you! Complete this final challenge and reap the rewards!

Full Features

  • A ton of wacky characters to unlock and play as
  • Loads of powers and upgrades to combine in to the ultiamte build!
  • Unlock permanent progression to aid you in each run
  • Play single player or local co-operative
  • 5 Unique stages, crash land on Planet X and face off against the crazy monsters that live there!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A micro horde-survival roguelike where time only moves when you do! Level up, choose your skills and slaughter thousands of monsters. Jump in the monster-slaying arena and piece together your collection of gear, characters, and stages to become the ultimate survivor!
